mapper.select: select deliciousMap.deliciousMapNum, deliciousMap.deliciousMapName, deliciousMap.deliciousMapDetail, delicious.deliciousImg, date_format(str_to_date(deliciousMap.deliciousMapCreateDate, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s'), '%Y-%m-%d') deliciousMapCreateDate, member.memberEmail, member.memberNum from member join (delicious right outer join deliciousMap on deliciousMap.deliciousMapNum=delicious.deliciousMapNum) where deliciousMapName like CONCAT('%',#{search},'%') or deliciousMapDetail like CONCAT('%',#{search},'%') group by deliciousMapNum order by deliciousMapNum;
select * from route join member on route.memberNum=member.memberNum where route.routeName like CONCAT('%',#{search},'%')
